          <title>
            <string language="en">Molecular structure of diamond</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Molekulare Struktur des Diamanten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Structure moléculaire de diamant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estrutura molecular do diamante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Struttura molecolare del diamante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μοριακή δομή του διαμαντιού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estructura molecular del diamante</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the 3-D ball-and-stick molecular model of diamond. The structure is a network of covalent bonds.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Atoms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Carbon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">covalent bonds</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">diamond</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hardness</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecular structure</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt dem Kugel-und-Stock 3-D 
molekulares Modell des Diamanten. Die Struktur ist ein Netz der 
kovalenten Bindungen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre au boule-et-bâton 3-D 
le modèle moléculaire du diamant. La structure est un réseau 
des obligations covalentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra à esfera-e-vara 3-D o 
modelo molecular do diamante. A estrutura é uma rede de 
ligações covalent.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra al sfera-e-bastone 3-D
il modello molecolare del diamante. La struttura è una rete dei
legami covalenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει στο τρισδιάστατο 
σφαίρα-και-ραβδί μοριακό μοντέλο του διαμαντιού. Η δομή 
είναι ένα δίκτυο των ομοιοπολικών δεσμών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra a bola-y-palillo 3-D el
modelo molecular del diamante. La estructura es una red de 
enlaces covalentes.</string>
          </description>
